##Part 2: Run Model for 300 Years
```{r}
source("forest_growth.R")

initialforest = 100
years = seq(from=1, to=300, by=1)


forest_1 = ode(y=initialforest, times=years, func=forest_growth,parms=c(initialforest, 0.01, 2, 500, 20, 100))
head(Ptime)
colnames(Ptime)=c("year","P")
```
